name: I Got Trapped in the Succubus's Dream!
name_original: I Got Trapped in the Succubus's Dream!
description:
The protagonist, trapped in the succubus's dream, cannot wake up.
The only way to escape is to navigate through the traps set within the dream and find the exit.
If you fall into a trap, you must start over to escape.
Escape from the dream and make your getaway.


  • Escape game
  • Puzzle elements
  • Dot animations
